title: Application errer
body:
After this new patch update i got the message something like application is unable to start properly 0xc00000005
And just tell me to close the game, this happen to me twice and i was literally banned from it please help me fix this asap if you know how please give me some advice. Anything will be appreciated. I also repair it with repairing tools also doesnt work

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is a generic error message which usually indicates you have a third party application attempting to hook into league.

Do you run LoLReplay or any other third party tool which attaches to league at all? If so, please disable/uninstall these.
